member.name: T:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.PreApplicationStartCode
member.summary: Provides a registration point for pre-application start code for Web Pages deployment.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.PreApplicationStartCode.Start
member.summary: Registers pre-application start code for Web Pages deployment.

member.name: T:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment
member.summary: Provides methods to confirm the deployment of a Web Pages application.

member.name: F:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.CacheKeyPrefix
member.summary: Represents the prefix for files that are stored in the cache.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetAssemblyPath(System.Version)
member.summary: Returns the full path of the folder that contains ASP.NET Web Pages assemblies for the specified version.
member.returns: The full path of the folder that contains ASP.NET Web Pages assemblies.
member.exception: The registry key for the path cannot be found.-or-The path cannot be found.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.GetVersion(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the version of ASP.NET Web Pages that is installed.
member.returns: The version of ASP.NET Web Pages that is installed, or null if the version is undetermined.
member.param: The path of the root directory for the application.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.IsEnabled(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the Web Pages application is enabled.
member.returns: true if the Web Pages application is enabled; otherwise, false.
member.param: The path of the root directory for the application.

member.name: M:System.Web.WebPages.Deployment.WebPagesDeployment.IsExplicitlyDisabled(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the Web Pages application is explicitly disabled.
member.returns: true if the Web Pages application is explicitly disabled; otherwise, false.
member.param: The path of the root directory for the application.
